title: Will you answer true? (NP)
brief_description: A companion film to “When I’m calling you”. John Cleese demonstrates an object lesson in how not to handle a sales inquiry on the telephone. Demonstrates eight points of correct telephone sales techniques to turn a general inquiry into a firm order. Narrated by Andrew Sachs. Cast includes John Cleese, Norman Bird, April Walker, Penelope Keith.
